quiz.text: As per the Special Bulletin on MMR released by the Registrar General of India (RGI), India’s Maternal Mortality ratio has declined to _______ per lakh live births in 2018-20 from _________ in 2014-16.
options: 97; 122
97; 130
103; 130
103; 122
70; 103

quiz.text:
Recently (Nov 2022), the Union Minister of State for Health and Family Welfare has represented India at the 3rd Global High-Level Ministerial Conference on Antimicrobial Resistance. Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the conference?

A.     It has been organized by Government of Egypt in collaboration with Gulf Health Council and Quadripartite Alliance.

B.      3rd edition of the conference has been held in Cairo, Egypt.

C.      The 2022 conference’s theme is “The AMR: from Policy to One Health Action”.
options: A and B
B and C
C only
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: The 3rd edition of the conference agreed on the Muscat Ministerial Manifesto, which sets out the three global targets. One of the targets is to reduce the total amount of antimicrobials used in agrifood systems by at least ___________by 2030.
options: 10-20%
25-40%
30-50%
40-50%
50-75%

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Ministry of Tourism has organized a ‘CEO (Chief Executive Officer) round table on Sustainable Tourism’ in New Delhi. Which of the following initiatives on sustainable Tourism has/have been signed by the participants?
options: Travel for LiFE Pledge
Responsible Traveler Campaign
Global Tourism Plastic Initiative
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), National Award Ceremony has been organised for the Swachh Vidyalaya Puraskar 2021- 22. The National Selection Committee has selected 39 schools for National level awards. How many schools have been selected from rural areas?
options: 22
18
21
17
15

quiz.text:
For Swachh Vidyalaya Puraskar, schools are rated on which of the following broad parameters?

A. Water

B. Toilets

C. Handwash with Soap

D. Capacity Building
options: A and B
B, C and D
A, C and D
C and D
A, B, C and D

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), a Special Meeting of the United Nations Country Team (UNCT) has been held at the UN House, _______________.
options: New York, USA
Doha, Qatar
Cairo, Egypt
Bali, Indonesia
New Delhi, India

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, Jal Jeevan Survekshan 2023 is started by the ____________ as part of Jal Jeevan Mission (JJM).
options: Department of Water Resources, River Development & Ganga Rejuvenation
Department of Drinking Water & Sanitation
Central Ground Water Board
Central Water Commission
Central Water and Power Research Station

quiz.text:
Under JJS, the districts are categorized under five heads based on the proportion of households with functional tap connections. Which of the following category head is/are correctly matched with regards to proportion of households with functional tap connections?

A.     Achievers                       –           25% to 50% Functional Tap Coverage

B.      Performers                    –            75% to 100% Functional Tap Coverage

C.      Aspirants                        –            0% to 25% Functional Tap Coverage
options: A and B
B and C
C only
B only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), PM has launched Karmayogi Bharat technology platform. Which of the following is the purpose of the platform?
options: It is an instant real-time payment system.
It is an online platform for managing data associated with pension of senior citizens.
It provides online courses for government officials.
It offers teachers, students and parents engaging learning material.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Union Ministry of Tourism has organized the 10th International Tourism Mart (ITM) for the North East Region at Aizawl, Mizoram. As per the information shared at the event, 100 view-points in North East region are being developed by which of the following ministries?
options: Ministry of Tourism
Ministry of Ministry of Development of North Eastern Region (DoNER)
Ministry of Road Transport & Highways
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: GCC countries contribute almost 35% of India's oil imports and _________ of its gas imports.
options: 50%
60%
45%
70%
85%

quiz.text: Which of the following countries is not a part of GCC?
options: Saudi Arabia
Yemen
Bahrain
Kuwait
Qatar

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Central Government has released an amount of Rs. 17,000 crores to States/UTs towards the balance GST (Goods and Services Tax) compensation for the period April to June, 2022. Compensation has been paid to the states assuming revenue growth rate of 14% with base year being _______________.
options: 2011-12
2014-15
2015-16
2016-17
2013-14

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), a National Conclave of State Finance Commissions (SFC) has been organized by which of the following organizations/ministries?
options: National Institute of Rural Development and Panchayati Raj
NITI Aayog
Ministry of Finance
1 and 3
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: 15th Central Finance Commission has recommended enhancing the existing professional tax from existing limit of Rs. 2500 to ___________ per annum.
options: Rs. 12,000
Rs. 10,000
Rs. 7,500
Rs. 5,000
Rs. 18,000

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Government-e-Marketplace (GeM) platform has crossed Rs. 1 Lakh crore Gross Merchandise value (GMV) till 29th November 2022 for the financial year 2022-2023. What was the GMV of GeM in FY 2021-2022?
options: Rs. 96,000 crore
Rs. 1.26 lakh crore
Rs. 84,000 crore
Rs. 1.06 lakh crore
Rs. 1.50 lakh crore

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), 4th edition of Indo-Pacific Regional Dialogue (IPRD) has been conducted in New Delhi by which of the following organizations/ministries?
options: Ministry of External Affairs
Ministry of Defence
Ministry of Home Affairs
NITI Aayog
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), India Africa Hackathon has been inaugurated at Gautam Buddha University, Uttar Pradesh. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect about the hackathon?
options: It has been organized by Ministry of Education, Ministry of External Affairs and UNESCO.
22 African countries along with India are participating in the hackathon.
Hackathon is organized to find solutions for issues in 3 thematic areas.
1 and 2
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the campaign described in the paragraph?

A.     The campaign has been organized by Ministry of Women & Child Development.

B.      It is a yearlong campaign.

C.      It will be triggered and mobilized by the Central government and will be joined by 30 State Missions.
options: A and B
C only
A only
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: As per NHFS (National Family Health Survey) 5, what is the percentage of women, who never sought any help from anyone about the violence inflicted on them?
options: 77%
45%
69%
54%
30%

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Telecom Regulatory Authority of India (TRAI) has released its recommendations on ‘Regulatory framework for promoting data economy through establishment of which of the following infrastructures?
options: Data Centres (DCs)
Content Delivery Networks (CDNs)
Interconnect Exchanges Providers (IXPs)
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Maritim Single Window System is an initiative of which of the following organizations/ministries?
options: Indian Navy
Ministry of Commerce & Industry
United Nations Conference on Trade and Development
International Maritime Organization

options: Finance
Defence
Home Affairs
Corporate Affairs
MSME

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Global Shield Against Climate Risks initiative has been launched at the 27th Conference of the Parties (COP27) at Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt. Which of the following countries is not a part of first batch of beneficiaries?
options: Sri Lanka
Bangladesh
Costa Rica
Ghana
Philippines

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), an e-commerce platform ‘Meesho’ has joined the Open Network for Digital Commerce (ONDC) to help connect buyers with hyperlocal sellers. ONDC was launched on pilot basis in 5 cities in April 2022. Which one of the following is not one of the five cities?
options: Bengaluru
Delhi

Bhopal

1999
1997

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Vice President of India has participated in the 17th East Asia Summit (EAS) organized in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. EAS is a forum of 18 countries of Asia-Pacific region, accounting for approximately ________ of global GDP (2021).
options: 85%
70%

60%
